title: Improve review process to prevent bugs from slipping through
description:
## Problem
Too many bugs are currently getting through the review process and reaching production/later stages.

## Goals
- Analyze current review process to identify gaps
- Implement improvements to catch bugs earlier
- Consider automated checks, checklists, or additional review stages

## Potential Solutions to Evaluate
1. Enhanced automated testing (unit, integration, e2e)
2. Review checklists or guidelines
3. Additional review stages for high-risk changes
4. Static analysis tools integration
5. Pre-commit hooks for common issues
6. Pair programming for complex features

## Success Criteria
- Measurable reduction in bugs found post-review
- Clear documentation of improved review process
- Team adoption of new practices
